title: Breathing Sensors Explainer: Unpacking the Potential of Visma-Lease a Bike’s ‘Transformational’ Tool
content:
'It could be as big a breakthrough as the first heart rate monitor': Visma is using a powerful new wearable from Tymewear that brings fourth dimension performance insights.

Read the full article at Breathing Sensors Explainer: Unpacking the Potential of Visma-Lease a Bike’s ‘Transformational’ Tool on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
